Part A Coverage
A qualified individual does not usually pay a premium for hospital insurance (Part A) coverage.Â  Hospital insurance covers certain
inpatient hospital care
skilled nursing home care, and
hospice care.
title: M21-1, Part IX, Subpart iii, Chapter 1, Section B - Social Security Administration (SSA) Benefits Program
